323823.「あはは！ 何度見ても\n あたし すっごい いい笑顔！\n <pc>に 撮って:
Ahaha! No matter how many times I see,
I just have the greatest smile, don't I?!
Maybe it's because you took the picture?

323824.「バーベキューも おいしかったな～。\n 鉄板で焼く お肉が ジューシーで！\n:
The barbecue was sooo good!
The grilled meat was super juicy! I ate
so much!

323825.「ラキは？ おみやげの\n お肉ぎっしりサンドイッチ どうだった？:
And you, Lycae? What did you think of that
meat sandwich I got for you?

323826.「ラキには 味とか おいしいとか……\n よく わからない。:
Lycae didn't really understand the taste of
the deliciousness....

323828.「……えへへー。\n また おみやげ 買ってくるからね！:
Ehehe... I'll just have to buy you a souvenir
again!

325192.「レーンの村は とっても\n ステキなところだったねー！\n 青い海に 青い空…:
Rane Village was sooo amazing!
Blue seas...blue skies...
It felt like a paradise!

325193.「ラキには 葉っぱで包み焼きにした お魚と\n フルーツを おみやげにしたんだよ:
I brought Lycae some leaf-wrapped fish
and some fruit as a souvenir.
How was it?

325194.「魚は 肉より ベトベトしない。\n でも 骨が ジャマ。:
Fish is not as sticky as meat...
But the bones were annoying.

325195.「フルーツは シャリシャリして……\n あまい……すっぱい？ あまずっぱい？\n:
The fruit was crunchy...
It was sweet...or sour? Sweet and sour?
It leaves a refreshing feeling in your mouth.

325196.「ふふ……ラキも ちょっとずつ\n 食べることに 慣れてきてるね！:
Hehe... You're slowly but surely getting used
to eating, Lycae!

325197.「じゃあ 今度 <pc>の家の\n フワーネさんから教わった\n どくけしそうの:
So, next time... I'll make the boiled
Antidotal Herbs that Flowfy from
<pc>'s house showed me...

325199.「ドルワーム王国で ドゥラくんに\n ごちそうしてもらった カレー！\n からか:
Dura treated me to some curry in Dolworm!
It was spicy, but it was so yummy!

325200.「ラキへの おみやげは\n ドゥラくん おすすめのお店で買った\n タンドリーチ:
Lycae's souvenir this time was some tandoori
chicken, from a shop recommended by Dura!
But, well...

325201.「ラキは からいのは 好きじゃない！\n 舌が ぴりぴりした……！:
Lycae doesn't like spicy food!
It makes his tongue hurt...

325202.「あはは……からい料理を 食べるのが\n 初めてで びっくりしちゃったんだよね。:
Ahaha... It must've been a shock eating
such spicy food, and for your first time...
Sorry about that.

325203.「……平気。シンイに 教えてもらったとおり\n ミルクを飲んだら クチの中が\n:
...It's fine. Lycae did what Shini taught him,
and drank some milk to soothe his burning
mouth...

325204.「今度 あたしも カレーを作ってみたいんだ。\n ミルクを入れて まろやかにした:
Next time, I want to try making some curry.
Maybe if I add some milk to it, it'll be mild
enough for you to eat it, too?

325205.「……どくけしそうも 入れる？: ...Are you going to use Antidotal Herbs again?

325207.「オルフェアの町の 町長さんで\n ナブナブ大サーカスの 団長さんで\n スゴ腕:
The mayor of Orphea...the ringmaster of the
Grand Nab Nab Circus...and an amazing
cake maker! It's Mr. Nab!

325208.「……あらためて こう言うと\n ナブおじさん すごすぎるね！？\n サーカスも:
I mean, when you really stop and think about
it...Mr. Nab is just amazing, isn't he?! His
circus act AND his cake were amazing!

325209.「ナブおじさん ラキへの おみやげに\n わざわざ クッキーを焼いてくれたんだよ:
He even went out his way to bake some
cookies just for you, Lycae. What did you
think of them?

325211.「えっ なんで！？\n あたしなんか うちに帰ってきて\n すぐ 食べちゃったの:
Huh? Why?! I ate mine as soon as I got
back home!

325212.「クッキー……ウサギとか\n ネコとかの形で 食べにくい……。:
Those cookies... They're shaped like
rabbits and cats...and they're hard to
eat.

325213.「あ～……そういうの\n 気になるタイプだったか～。:
Ah, so that's it...
It's how they're shaped.

325214.「王都カミハルムイの 舟盛り～！\n 見た目が ゴージャス！\n お刺身で ごは:
Kamuharmui's boat-shaped platter!
Simply gorgeous looking! The sashimi
and rice go perfectly together!

325215.「あたし 生のお魚を 食べるの\n 初めてだったんだ。じつは ちょっとだけ\n:
It was my first time eating raw fish, so I
was a little scared...but it turned out
delicious!

325216.「お刺身のテイクアウトは できなかったから\n ラキへの おみやげは おにぎりの:
I couldn't bring any sashimi home with me,
so I bought a box of rice balls for you
instead. What did you think, Lycae?

325218.「おお～っ！？\n 今までにない 好感触！:
Oh ho, really?!
I'm so glad to hear you say that!

325219.「ふふっ うれしいな うれしいなー！\n ラキは どれが スキだった？\n あた:
Hehe... I'mーsoーhappy! ♪ So, which rice
ball was your favorite? If I were you, I'd
choose the salmon one.

325221.「そっちー！？\n おにぎりじゃなくて 付け合わせ！？:
That one?! That's a side dish, not a rice
ball!

325222.「……そういえば レーンの村のフルーツも\n 食べっぷりが よかったね。もしかし:
Now that you mention it, you did like eating
the fruits in Lane Village... I guess you like
fruits and vegetables, then?

326345.「メルサンディ村の ルーデさんが焼いてくれた\n おいしカワイイ パンたち！:
Mrs. Rudy in Melsandy Village baked super
cute and yummy bread!

326346.「ルーデさんは アイリちゃんって子のおうちの\n お手伝いさんなんだけど……\n:
She's a maid who helps out at Aili's house...
She's a pretty well known baker.

326347.「ラキにも おみやげの\n スライムパンを 焼いてくれたんだよね。\n かわいい:
They even baked some Slime bread as a
souvenir for Lycae. It's really cute, so it
might be hard for him to eat...

326348.「平気。ウサギとか ネコとちがって\n スライムは 魔物だから。:
It's fine. Rabbits and cats aren't monsters,
but Slimes are.

326349.「意外と 判断が シビアだった。:
That was a harsher judgment than I
expected...

326350.「……それに 食べ物には 作った人の気持ちも\n こめられてるって ポルテが言っ:
Also, Porte said that food has the feelings
of those who made it inside.

326351.「ナブレットのクッキーも\n ルーデのパンも……おいしかった。:
Nablette's cookies, and Rudy's bread...
They were good.

326352.「……ふふ。ごはんを味わうのに 必要なのは\n 味覚だけじゃないのかも……。:
Hehe... I guess taste isn't the only reason
to enjoy food, huh...

326353.「イーサの村の ヘモニグおばあちゃんの\n 特製にんにく豆乳鍋～！\n 寒いから:
In Ether Village, Granny Hemonig made her
special garlic soymilk hotpot! It's really
cold there, so the hotpot was super good!

326354.「お鍋を持って帰るのは むずかしかったから\n あまった材料と レシピをもらって:
It was hard to take some home, so I instead
got the recipe and tried making some
myself. What did you think, Lycae?

326355.「にんにくのニオイは ちょっと 苦手……。\n でも 野菜と豆乳の鍋は……すき。:
Not too fond of the garlic smell...
But a vegetable and soymilk hot pot...
it's good. It's soft and sweet.

326356.「あと……食べると おなかの中が\n ポカポカする。最初は おどろいたけど……\:
Also...Lycae's stomach warms up when he eats
it. It surprised him at first...but it's not a
bad feeling.

326357.「それは たぶん 隠し味の効果だね……\n あたしの 投げキッスの！:
I bet that's the secret ingredient working its
magicーmy blown kisses!

326359.「おばあちゃん直伝の 隠し味だよ。\n イーサの村でも みんなで\n 投げキッス:
It's a secret ingredient that Granny showed
to me. Apparently, it's a custom in Ether
Village to blow a kiss before eating it.

326360.「そうだ！ 今から もう一回 お鍋を作ろっか。\n 今度は <pc>にも\n ラ:
I know! How about we make some more hotpot
right now? We can get <pc> to blow
a kiss for you this time, too...

326361.「いっ……いい！ 大丈夫！\n ラキは 今 おなかいっぱい……！:
I...it's okay! Really!
Lycae is too full now...

326362.「海底都市ルシュカの 海底料理～！\n ラキへのおみやげは ルシュカ名物\n 深:
Undersea cuisine from the undersea city, Ruska! For Lycae's souvenir, I brought home their specialtiesーDeepsea Barnacles and
Krapilpil.

326363.「黒い山型のやつが 深淵フジツボで……\n カラフルなのが クラピルピル。\n:
The black ones that look like mountains are
the barnacles...and the colorful ones are the
Krapilpil. You use straw to drink them.

326364.「あたしと <pc>にとっても\n 未知の味だったのに ラキには ちょっと\n:
It was a pretty new taste for <pc>
and I...so it might've been too soon for
you, Lycae....were they okay?

326367.「ルシュカは 海底にあるから\n 食材も調理方法も すご～く 特殊らしいよ。\n:
Since Ruska is underwater, both its cooking methods and ingredients are supposed to be reeeeeally unusual. I don't blame you that
you didn't enjoy it...

326368.「ストローを使うの はじめてで……\n 吸ったら むせて たいへんだった。:
It was Lycae's first time using a straw.
It was really hard to suck in, and he
choked too...

326370.「エッちゃんのおうちで お茶会！\n あたしが育てたハーブの ハーブティーと……:
We had a tea party at Estie's house! The tea was made from herbs I grew. As for our snack, it was the specialty of the Nadravian's
Restーhot spring eggs!

326371.「……正直 ハーブティーと温泉卵は\n 相性バツグン！ って感じじゃなかったね。:
To be honest, herbal tea and hard boiled
didn't exactly feel "perfect match!" to me.
It's not that they DON'T go together, but...

326372.「でも そーいうの含めて 楽しかったなあ！\n <pc>と エッちゃんと\n い:
Even so, it was a ton of fun!
The three of us got to chat about a lot
of things.

326373.「ラキは？ ハーブティーは\n いつも 飲んでるけど……\n おみやげの 温泉卵:
What about you, Lycae? You're always
drinking herbal tea, so... What did you
think of the eggs?

326374.「温泉卵は……とろとろしてた。\n ……けっこう すきな食感。:
The eggs were...gooey.
But Lycae liked the texture.

326375.「よかった～！\n そう言えば エッちゃん 神獣の姿のラキにも\n 会いたいって:
I'm glad to hear that! Oh, yeah, that's
right! Estie said that she wanted to meet
you in your divine beast form.

326376.「あたしが作った ラキのぬいぐるみを\n プレゼントしたら すっごい よろこんで:
When I gave her a Lycae plushie I made,
she was sooo happy! That's when she
said she wanted to see you...

326377.「ラキのベッドに置かれたのと 同じ\n ぬいぐるみ……？ あれは ラキじゃない。:
The same plushie on Lycae's bed...?
That's not Lycae. Wolf Lycae is much cooler!

329213.「魔幻宮殿の 巨大ゼリー！\n お菓子で作られた カブトムシが\n すごい イン:
It's the Demon Palace's Jiant Jelly!
The beetle made out of candy makes
quite the impression.

329214.「なんでも カブトムシが離れない おいしさ！\n っていう キャッチコピーで\n:
I guess there's even a catchphrase, too: "So
good, even beetles can't resist!" I guess
it's a craze all across the Demon World...

329215.「これを おみやげで渡したとき\n ラキのお耳が ぺしょ～って なったんだ。\n:
When I gave this to you as a souvenir, your
ears went dead flat. Did it scare you, Lycae?

329216.「……ポルテが このカブトムシは\n 食べれるって言うから 食べた。\n あまく:
Porte said that you could eat the beetle, so
Lycae ate it. It was sweet and tasty.

329217.「でも カブトムシは\n 食べるより 見るほうが すき。:
But he would rather watch beetles than
eat them.

329218.「なるほど……わんこは うれしいときも\n お耳ぺしょ～って なるもんね。:
I see... So when dogs get happy, they also
flatten their ears.

329219.「なら 今度 虫取りにいってみる？\n 一年中 カブトムシや クワガタが\n 捕:
Well, how about we go bug catching next time? I heard there's a place in the Wena Islands where you can catch even stag beetles
all year round.

329220.「クワガタも！？ 行くっ！！: Stag beetles?! We have to go!!

329221.「バルディスタ城の 名物コック\n ブッチャーさんの 爆速料理たち～！:
Inside Valdista's castle, the famous chef
Mr. Butcher cooked some super-quick
dishes!

329222.「６本のウデで 作る料理は\n 速い！ おいしい！ おいしい！\n いっぱい 食:
Food made with six arms is super quick
AND super yummy! I ate so much!

329223.「おみやげに バルディスタ名物の\n ソーセージまで 持たせてくれたから\n う:
They even gave me Valdista's famous sausage
as a souvenir, so I just had to grill some
myself...

329224.「しょっぱかった……！\n アストルティアの ソーセージより\n しょっぱいと思:
They were salty! Maybe even saltier than
Astoltia's sausages.

329225.「言われてみると バルディスタの料理は\n 全体的に しょっぱかったかも。\n:
Now that you mention it, a lot of Valdista's
dishes were pretty salty. I guess they must
like a strong flavor?

329226.「しかも ソーセージは 保存食だから\n 塩分が多いよね。戦争のときも 携帯食と:
Plus, sausages are preserved food, so they're
salty anyway. They said that during the war,
people ate sausage as rations.

329227.「家で食べるときは 野菜も\n いっしょに 食べたほうがいい。\n 身体に わる:
When eating at home, it's good to eat
vegetables too. Too much salt isn't
good for your body.

329228.「健康にうるさい 神獣だなあ……。: A divine beast, fussing about your health...
